name: Sherlock: A Study in Scarlet
description:
This is my Gameboy adaptation of the first Sherlock Holmes short story, A Study in Scarlet, by Sir Arthur Conan Doyle. This is essentially a visual novel; expect a lot of text boxes and not a lot of game mechanics. 

I developed it in GB Studio for the Gameboy; you can play it in your browser here, or download the .gb file and play it in a Gameboy emulator.
You can also download the project file from this page, if you're interested in seeing how I developed it in GB Studio. Spoiler alert: It's pretty straightfoward.

CONTROLS:
Z - A Button (interact/deduce)
X - B Button (talk to Watson)
ARROW KEYS - D-Pad (Movement)
ENTER - Start Button (Pause)
SHIFT - Select Button (Unused
